label: 惟宗孝言
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (?1015-?1097). Kanshi in Honchō mudaishi 本朝無題詩(31), Chūyū ki burui shihai kanshishū 中右記部類紙背漢詩集 (11), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (1). Prose compositions in Honchō zoku monzui 本朝続文粋 (7), Choya gunsai. [漢詩、朝野群載]
